title: Moral Combat
description: Most of us have a clear sense of right and wrong. But what happens when we view politics through a moral lens? This week, we talk with psychologist Linda Skitka about how moral certainty can produce moral blinders — and endanger democracy.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
